TEXT.TITLE: CHRYSLER <C> LATE-FEBRUARY SALES RISE 11 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Chrysler Corp said sales of its U.S.-built cars rose 11 pct in the February 20-28 period to 30,634 units compared to 27,526 in the period a year ago. There were seven selling days in both periods. For the month of February sales fell two pct to 78,508 cars from 80,322 a year ago. Year-to-date sales were not immediately available. Reuter
